title: Futatsu no Kurumi
synopsis: Futatsu no Kurumi is a short story following 12-year-old Ayaka as she is teleported back in time to the fire bombing of Tokyo in 1945 and covers her experiences in this very different and unfamiliar environment. (from saizen-fansubs)
related_anime: ['Kiku-chan to Ookami', 'Boku no Boukuugou', 'Yakeato no, Okashi no Ki', 'Tako ni Natta Okaasan', 'Umigame to Shounen', 'Chiisai Sensuikan ni Koi wo Shita Dekasugiru Kujira no Hanashi', 'Aoi Hitomi no Onnanoko no Ohanashi']
staff: [['Hirai, Minetarou', ['Director']], ['Yasumi, Tetsuo', ['Director']], ['Seki, Shuuichi', ['Character Design']], ['Ootake, Masae', ['Animation Director']]]
